title: Stations of the Cross
description: Walk the path Jesus took to his crucifixion in Jerusalem

locations.title: Jesus is Condemned to Death
locations.description: The site of the Antonia Fortress where Jesus was condemned by Pontius Pilate

locations.title: Jesus Carries His Cross
locations.description: Where Jesus took up the cross to begin his journey

locations.title: Jesus Falls the First Time
locations.description: The first location where Jesus fell under the weight of the cross

locations.title: Jesus Meets His Mother
locations.description: Where Mary encountered her son on the way to Calvary

locations.title: Simon of Cyrene Helps Jesus
locations.description: Where Simon was compelled to help carry the cross

locations.title: Veronica Wipes Jesus' Face
locations.description: Traditional site where Veronica wiped Jesus' face

locations.title: Jesus Falls the Second Time
locations.description: The second fall on the way to Golgotha

locations.title: Jesus Meets the Women of Jerusalem
locations.description: Where Jesus spoke to the women mourning for him

locations.title: Jesus Falls the Third Time
locations.description: The third and final fall before reaching Calvary

locations.title: Jesus is Stripped of His Garments
locations.description: Inside the Church of the Holy Sepulchre - preparation for crucifixion

locations.title: Jesus is Nailed to the Cross
locations.description: The site of crucifixion at Golgotha

locations.title: Jesus Dies on the Cross
locations.description: The place of the skull where Jesus gave up his spirit

locations.title: Jesus is Taken Down from the Cross
locations.description: The Stone of Anointing where Jesus' body was prepared

locations.title: Jesus is Laid in the Tomb
locations.description: The Holy Sepulchre - the tomb where Jesus was buried

title: Battle of Gettysburg
description: Explore the turning point of the American Civil War

locations.title: Cemetery Ridge
locations.description: The Union defensive position during the battle

locations.title: Little Round Top
locations.description: Critical Union position defended by Joshua Chamberlain

locations.title: Devil's Den
locations.description: Rocky battlefield where fierce fighting occurred

locations.title: Pickett's Charge
locations.description: The site of the famous Confederate assault on July 3, 1863

locations.title: Culp's Hill
locations.description: Eastern anchor of the Union line

locations.title: Cemetery Hill
locations.description: Key Union defensive position on the first day
